replies.body:
Hey, zYasuoIsMyMainz!

I think it's awesome that your passion for League drives you to create youtube content for the community. You can apply for PBE access [*here.*](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)

Best of luck with your application! I hope we get to see some awesome PBE content videos from you soon. :)

Let me know if you have any questions~ {{champion:44}}

Well I wanted to know if I was accepted because la says erro500 has how to help me qnd to this? I want mt help the test server PBE! ...{{champion:202}} 
I created this NA account only to participate in the PBE Help me pls. My original account and BR lvl30

It's gonna be pretty tough to get accepted into the PBE if you aren't actively playing the account you applied with. There have been some instances when we've invited level 1 account, but we mostly look for *really active* players, so you may want to play this account more. ^.^

As for the PBE 500 error, you should be able to resolve this by taking the steps below:

1. [**Clear your browser's cache.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)
2. Visit the [**NA Landing page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/) and sign into your NA League account.
3. Visit the PBE Signup Page for NA using [**this link**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).

Let me know if this properly showed your PBE status to you without the 500 error now. ^.^
